Downmix to Mono: モノラルにダウンミックス
Audio Monitoring: オーディオ モニタリング
Monitor Only (mute output): モニターのみ（出力をミュート）
Monitor audio levels. If the bars are mo: オーディオレベルをモニターします。バーが動いている場合、オーディオが出力されています。
Hide in Mixer: ミキサー内で非表示にする
Time it takes between sound occuring and: Time it takes between sound occuring and being broadcast (ms)
Route audio to the central channel inste: Route audio to the central channel instead of left or right stereo channels
Generally, enabling monitoring sends the: Generally, enabling monitoring sends the audio through the Desktop Audio channel
Designates if this source is audible in: Designates if this source is audible in your live broadcast
Designates if this source is audible in your recorded track(s)
